notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: G.Y., H.K.P. and H.J.D. designed the studies. G.Y., K.J.B., M.Z., K.M., S. Sanisetty and S. Sonnberg performed assays and analyzed data. G.H. analyzed data and performed statistical analyses. G.Y., S.T. and C.S.G. managed inÂ vivo work. H.K.P. and H.J.D. provided program oversight. G.Y. and H.J.D. wrote the paper with all co-authors. All authors approved the final manuscript.
